usage.cn: 当你还有得机会选择时，不妨冒险一试。
usage.eng: Take the chance while you still have the choice.

usage.cn: 一寸光阴一寸金，寸金难买寸光阴。
usage.eng: Every hour of lost time is a chance of future misfortune.

usage.cn: 抓住机会，全心付出，不留遗憾的离开。
usage.eng: Take chances, give everything, and leave with no regrets.

usage.cn: 善待令你讨厌的人。很有可能，你最后会为其中之一工作。
usage.eng: Be nice to nerds. Chances are you'll end up working for one.
